Welcome to RForecast.py’s documentation!¶

RForecast.py is a Python wrapper that exposes most of the functionality of R’s Forecast package in python. Some related functions in the stats and base packages are also exposed (e.g. seasonal decompositions). A few less-commnonly used functions and arguments are not exposed.

\[(a + b)^2 = a^2 + 2ab + b^2\]

Since Pythagoras, we know that \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\).
